attributes.action: provide 'Slow: Hedgehogs' signs on roads in urban areas with high hedgehog populations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If they can do it for ducks and antelope, why not for hedgehogs? A beautiful part of traditional British wildlife - which is now far and few between - these little creatures date back to prehistoric times and provide natural pest control services to our gardens. We came and build roads and houses in their natural habitat, the least we could do is try not to squash them on our roads.
